section.heading: Receipt of gifts, grants, and bequests

content.p: Print RCWs > Title 74 > Chapter 74.18 > Section 74.18.110 74.18.100 << 74.18.110 >> 74.18.120 PDF RCW 74.18.110 Receipt of gifts, grants, and bequests. The department may receive, accept, and disburse gifts, grants, conveyances, devises, and bequests from public or private sources, in trust or otherwise, if the terms and conditions thereof will provide services for blind persons in a manner consistent with the purposes of this chapter and with other provisions of law. Any money so received shall be deposited in the state treasury for investment or expenditure in accordance with the conditions of its receipt. [ 2003 c 409 s 9 ; 1983 c 194 s 11 .] NOTES: Findings — 2003 c 409: See note following RCW 74.18.010 .
